name: Oceans Apart EP
description:
Rise Through The Remains long anticipated EP now available. With 7 tracks to surely take you on a journey. Mixing varieties of genres ranging from: metal, metalcore, hardcore, and techno; making a lustrous blend. These songs take you on a roller coaster ride with catchy head banging riffs, melodic riffs, and catchy heavy break downs. This EP stands apart from many other bands in the music scene today. There are many influences, but not just another cloned sound.

P.S. - If you want the EP signed by the band; you can request it through paypal.


Track Listing:

1. Sunrise (A New Beginning)
2. Lifetime of Suffering
3. Facade
4. Elysium Alps
5. Oceans Apart
6. Black Sunrise
7. Dick Breath*

* - Bonus Track
